body:
[build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1682861/build.out.txt)
I did `spack install gdal` on macOS High Sierra and the latest Spack.  It worked, and installed `libgdal.dylib`.  However, this library will not load with `dlopen()` (or any other way), because it has ITSELF as a dependency, but in the stage --- which has since been deleted.

```
$ cd `spack location -i gdal`/lib
$ otool -L libgdal.dylib
libgdal.dylib:
	/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/libgdal.dylib (compatibility version 0.0.0, current version 0.0.0)
	/Users/citibeth/spack/melissa/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-9.0.0-apple/sqlite-3.21.0-2vkzp2on66wjjfmwg3xsg3rqgofq7x7d/lib/libsqlite3.0.dylib (compatibility version 9.0.0, current version 9.6.0)
	/usr/lib/libexpat.1.dylib (compatibility version 7.0.0, current version 8.0.0)
    ...
```

My workaround for now is to hack `gdal/package.py` to install static.  Does anyone have any insight on this problem?  Is it specific to GDAL, or common for all of macOS?

I've included the link line from `spack-build.out` below; and also attached the entire build log.  After it links, it does some other stuff to the library, maybe that's causing the problem.

```
/Users/citibeth/spack/melissa/lib/spack/env/clang/clang++
-dynamiclib
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/frmts/o/*.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/gcore/*.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/port/*.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/alg/*.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/commonutils.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/gdalinfo_lib.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/gdal_translate_lib.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/gdalwarp_lib.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/ogr2ogr_lib.o
/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/gdaldem_lib.o

/private/var/folders/gd/t1br2vk136z0zj9d9cx8t4kc0000gp/T/citibeth/spack-stage/spack-stage-d1jL_y/gdal-2.1.2/apps/gdal_rasterize_lib.o

```
title: gdal: Bad Install Name for Shared Library
